00018 t_grid::t_grid(int w, int h): width(w), height(h)
00019 {
00020     assert( sizeof(t_gridpoint)==sizeof(asm_gridpt) );
00021     
00022     gridpoints= new t_gridpoint[(w+1)*(h+1)];
00023     editor= t_pgrid::getinstance()->editor;
00024     for(int i= (w+1)*(h+1)-1; i>=0; i--)
00025     {
00026         gridpoints[i].height= 0.0;
00027         gridpoints[i].speedmod_x= gridpoints[i].speedmod_y= 0.0;
00028         gridpoints[i].color.r= gridpoints[i].color.g= gridpoints[i].color.b= gridpoints[i].color.a= 128;
00029     }
00030     
00031     for(int y= 0; y<=height; y++)
00032     {
00033         for(int x= 0; x<=width; x++)
00034         {
00035             t_gridpoint &p= gridpoints[y*(width+1)+x];  //getpoint(x, y);
00036             p.x= x*GRIDGRANULARITY; p.y= y*GRIDGRANULARITY;
00037         }
00038     }
00039     
00040     drawing_indices= new int[width*height*4];
00041     for(int y= 0; y<height; y++)
00042     {
00043         for(int x= 0; x<width; x++)
00044         {
00045             drawing_indices[(y*width+x)*4+0]= (y+0)*(width+1)+(x+0);
00046             drawing_indices[(y*width+x)*4+1]= (y+0)*(width+1)+(x+1);
00047             drawing_indices[(y*width+x)*4+2]= (y+1)*(width+1)+(x+1);
00048             drawing_indices[(y*width+x)*4+3]= (y+1)*(width+1)+(x+0);
00049         }
00050     }
00051 }

00055 void t_grid::render_quadstrips(float img_x, float img_y, float img_w, float img_h)
00056 {
00057     static float colA[]= { 0, 0, 0, 0.5 };
00058     static float colB[]= { 137.0/255, 194.0/255, 255.0/255, 0.6 };
00059     
00060     //~ glEnable(GL_TEXTURE_2D);
00061     //~ glEnable(GL_TEXTURE_GEN_S);
00062     //~ glEnable(GL_TEXTURE_GEN_T);
00063     //~ glTexGeni(GL_S, GL_TEXTURE_GEN_MODE, GL_OBJECT_LINEAR);
00064     //~ glTexGeni(GL_T, GL_TEXTURE_GEN_MODE, GL_OBJECT_LINEAR);
00065     //~ glMatrixMode(GL_TEXTURE);
00066     //~ glPushMatrix();
00067     //~ glScalef(1.0/32, 1.0/32, 1);
00068 
00069     for(int y= 0; y<height; y++)
00070     {
00071         glBegin(GL_QUAD_STRIP);
00072         for(int x= 0; x<=width; x++)
00073         {
00074             t_gridpoint &t0= getpoint(x,y),
00075                         &t1= getpoint(x,y+1);
00076             float ch= t0.height+.5;
00077 
00078             glColor4f(colA[0]+(colB[0]-colA[0])*ch, colA[1]+(colB[1]-colA[1])*ch, colA[2]+(colB[2]-colA[2])*ch, colA[3]+(colB[3]-colA[3])*ch);
00079             glVertex3f(x*GRIDGRANULARITY, y*GRIDGRANULARITY, t0.height);
00080             
00081             ch= t1.height+.5;
00082             glColor4f(colA[0]+(colB[0]-colA[0])*ch, colA[1]+(colB[1]-colA[1])*ch, colA[2]+(colB[2]-colA[2])*ch, colA[3]+(colB[3]-colA[3])*ch);
00083             glVertex3f(x*GRIDGRANULARITY, (y+1)*GRIDGRANULARITY, t1.height);
00084             
00085         }
00086         glEnd();
00087     }
00088     
00089     //~ glPopMatrix();
00090     //~ glDisable(GL_TEXTURE_GEN_S);
00091     //~ glDisable(GL_TEXTURE_GEN_T);
00092 }

00094 void t_grid::render_quads(float img_x, float img_y, float img_w, float img_h)
00095 {
00096     static float colA[]= { 0, 0, 0, 0.5 };
00097     static float colB[]= { 137.0/255, 194.0/255, 255.0/255, 0.6 };
00098     
00099     glBegin(GL_QUADS);
00100     for(int y= 0; y<height; y++)
00101     {
00102         for(int x= 0; x<width; x++)
00103         {
00104             t_gridpoint &t0= getpoint(x,y),     &t1= getpoint(x+1,y),
00105                         &t2= getpoint(x,y+1),   &t3= getpoint(x+1,y+1);
00106             float ch= t0.height+.5;
00107 
00108             glColor4f(colA[0]+(colB[0]-colA[0])*ch, colA[1]+(colB[1]-colA[1])*ch, colA[2]+(colB[2]-colA[2])*ch, colA[3]+(colB[3]-colA[3])*ch);
00109             glVertex3f(t0.x, t0.y, t0.height);
00110             
00111             ch= t1.height+.5;
00112             glColor4f(colA[0]+(colB[0]-colA[0])*ch, colA[1]+(colB[1]-colA[1])*ch, colA[2]+(colB[2]-colA[2])*ch, colA[3]+(colB[3]-colA[3])*ch);
00113             glVertex3f(t1.x, t1.y, t1.height);
00114             glVertex3f(t3.x, t3.y, t3.height);
00115             glVertex3f(t2.x, t2.y, t2.height);
00116             
00117         }
00118     }
00119     glEnd();
00120 }
00121 
00122 void t_grid::render_scanlines(float img_x, float img_y, float img_w, float img_h)
00123 {
00124     static rgbabcolor coltable[256];
00125     for(int i= 0; i<256; i++)
00126     {
00127         rgbabcolor &c= coltable[i];
00128         int r= i*2, g= i*3/2, b= i/2;
00129         c.a= 255;
00130         c.r= r>255? 255: r;
00131         c.g= g>255? 255: g;
00132         c.b= b;
00133     }
00134 
00135     glColor4f(1,1,1,1);
00136     glBegin(GL_QUADS);
00137     bool was_empty= false;
00138     int first_empty_scanline= 0;
00139     for(int y= 0; y<height; y++)
00140     {
00141         int startx= 0;
00142         while(startx<width)
00143         {
00144             t_gridpoint &p0= gridpoints[  y  *(width+1)+startx],
00145                         &p1= gridpoints[(y+1)*(width+1)+startx],
00146                         *p2, *p3;
00147             int endx;
00148             for(endx= startx+1; endx<=width; endx++)
00149             {
00150                 p2= &gridpoints[  y  *(width+1)+endx];
00151                 p3= &gridpoints[(y+1)*(width+1)+endx];
00152                 if( (!p0.looks_equal(p1)) || (!p0.looks_equal(*p2)) || (!p0.looks_equal(*p3)) )
00153                     break;
00154             }
00155             
00156             if(startx==0 && endx==width+1)
00157             {
00158                 // leere scanline
00159                 if(!was_empty)
00160                     first_empty_scanline= y,
00161                     was_empty= true;
00162                 startx= width;
00163             }
00164             else
00165             {
00166                 // gefüllte scanline
00167                 if(was_empty)
00168                 {
00169                     t_gridpoint &p0= gridpoints[first_empty_scanline*(width+1)],
00170                                 &p1= gridpoints[first_empty_scanline*(width+1)+width],
00171                                 &p2= gridpoints[y*(width+1)+width],
00172                                 &p3= gridpoints[y*(width+1)];
00173                     int c= int(p0.disp_height*128)+128;
00174                     p0.color= coltable[ (c<0? 0: c>255? 255: c) ];
00175                     glColor4ubv((u8*)&p0.color);
00176                     glVertex3f(p0.x, p0.y, p0.disp_height);
00177                     glVertex3f(p1.x, p1.y, p1.disp_height);
00178                     glVertex3f(p2.x, p2.y, p2.disp_height);
00179                     glVertex3f(p3.x, p3.y, p3.disp_height);
00180                     was_empty= false;
00181                 }
00182                 
00183                 if(endx-startx>1)
00184                 {
00185                     startx= endx-1;
00186                     p2= &gridpoints[  y  *(width+1)+endx-1];
00187                     p3= &gridpoints[(y+1)*(width+1)+endx-1];
00188                     
00189                     t_gridpoint *p= &gridpoints[y*(width+1)+startx];
00190                     int c= int(p->disp_height*128)+128;
00191                     p->color= coltable[ (c<0? 0: c>255? 255: c) ];
00192                     glColor4ubv((u8*)&p->color);
00193                     glVertex3f(p0.x, p0.y, (p0.disp_height));
00194                     glVertex3f(p2->x, p2->y, (p2->disp_height));
00195                     glVertex3f(p3->x, p3->y, (p3->disp_height));
00196                     glVertex3f(p1.x, p1.y, (p1.disp_height));
00197                 }
00198                 else
00199                 {
00200                     t_gridpoint *p= &gridpoints[y*(width+1)+startx];
00201                     int c= int(p->disp_height*128)+128;
00202                     p->color= coltable[ (c<0? 0: c>255? 255: c) ];
00203                     glColor4ubv((u8*)&p->color);
00204                     glVertex3f(p0.x, p0.y, (p0.disp_height));
00205                     
00206                     p= &gridpoints[y*(width+1)+endx];
00207                     c= int(p->disp_height*128)+128;
00208                     p->color= coltable[ (c<0? 0: c>255? 255: c) ];
00209                     glColor4ubv((u8*)&p->color);
00210                     glVertex3f(p2->x, p2->y, (p2->disp_height));
00211                     
00212                     p= &gridpoints[(y+1)*(width+1)+endx];
00213                     c= int(p->disp_height*128)+128;
00214                     p->color= coltable[ (c<0? 0: c>255? 255: c) ];
00215                     glColor4ubv((u8*)&p->color);
00216                     glVertex3f(p3->x, p3->y, (p3->disp_height));
00217                     
00218                     p= &gridpoints[(y+1)*(width+1)+startx];
00219                     c= int(p->disp_height*128)+128;
00220                     p->color= coltable[ (c<0? 0: c>255? 255: c) ];
00221                     glColor4ubv((u8*)&p->color);
00222                     glVertex3f(p1.x, p1.y, (p1.disp_height));
00223 
00224                     startx= endx;
00225                 }
00226             }
00227         }
00228     }
00229     if(was_empty)
00230     {
00231         t_gridpoint &p0= gridpoints[first_empty_scanline*(width+1)],
00232                     &p1= gridpoints[first_empty_scanline*(width+1)+width],
00233                     &p2= gridpoints[(height-1)*(width+1)+width],
00234                     &p3= gridpoints[(height-1)*(width+1)];
00235         int c= int(p0.disp_height*128)+128;
00236         p0.color= coltable[ (c<0? 0: c>255? 255: c) ];
00237         glColor4ubv((u8*)&p0.color);
00238         glVertex3f(p0.x, p0.y, p0.disp_height);
00239         glVertex3f(p1.x, p1.y, p1.disp_height);
00240         glVertex3f(p2.x, p2.y, p2.disp_height);
00241         glVertex3f(p3.x, p3.y, p3.disp_height);
00242         was_empty= false;
00243     }
00244     glEnd();
00245     return;
00246 }
00247 
00248 void t_grid::render_arrays(float img_x, float img_y, float img_w, float img_h)
00249 {
00250     static rgbabcolor coltable[256];
00251     for(int i= 0; i<256; i++)
00252     {
00253         rgbabcolor &c= coltable[i];
00254         int r= i*2, g= i*3/2, b= i/2;
00255         c.a= 255;
00256         c.r= r>255? 255: r;
00257         c.g= g>255? 255: g;
00258         c.b= b;
00259     }
00260 
00261     for(int i= (width+1)*(height+1)-1; i>=0; i--)
00262     {
00263         t_gridpoint &p= gridpoints[i];
00264         int c= int(p.height*128)+128;
00265         p.color= coltable[ (c<0? 0: c>255? 255: c) ];
00266     }
00267 
00268     
00269     glEnableClientState(GL_VERTEX_ARRAY);
00270     glEnableClientState(GL_COLOR_ARRAY);
00271     
00272     glVertexPointer(3, GL_FLOAT, sizeof(t_gridpoint), gridpoints);
00273     glColorPointer(4, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, sizeof(t_gridpoint), &gridpoints[0].color);
00274     
00275     glDrawElements(GL_QUADS, width*height*4, GL_UNSIGNED_INT, drawing_indices);
00276     
00277     glDisableClientState(GL_VERTEX_ARRAY);
00278     glDisableClientState(GL_COLOR_ARRAY);
00279 }
00280 
00281 void t_grid::render(float img_x, float img_y, float img_w, float img_h)
00282 {
00283     render_arrays(img_x, img_y, img_w, img_h);
00284     //~ render_scanlines(img_x, img_y, img_w, img_h);
00285 }

00290 
00291 bool t_gridpoint::looks_equal(t_gridpoint &other)
00292 {
00293     return ( disp_height==other.disp_height );
00294 }
